oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of the Straessler-Kittel theory of phase transitions: thermodynamic properties and application to the Verwey transition
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GOPALAN, P
HONIG, JM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mean-field model
magnetite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Thermodynamic quantities derived from the Straessler-Kittel theory of phase transitions are derived and evaluated. The applicability of these results to the Verwey transition of magnetite is briefly discussed. (C) 2002 Editions scientifiques et medicales Elsevier SAS. .
